benchmark_details.name: Loong
benchmark_details.overview: Loong is a novel long-context benchmark designed for evaluating long-context capabilities of large language models (LLMs) with a focus on realistic multi-document question answering scenarios, introducing new task categories and contextual variations.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To assess the long-context modeling capabilities of LLMs in real-world scenarios across multiple documents and varied context lengths.

data.source: Documents were manually collected from official websites, including financial reports, legal cases, and academic papers.
data.annotation: Annotations were performed manually by experts and further refined using GPT-4o.

methodology.calculation: Scores are calculated based on the evaluation of model outputs against the gold standard answers.
methodology.interpretation: A high score indicates better overall performance of LLMs on long-context tasks.
methodology.validation: Extensive experiments validated with multiple models showing their performance across different tasks.
